t: BrandSimple: How the Best Brands Keep it Simple and Succeed: Amazon.co.uk: Adamson A.P: 9781403984906: Books
s: Allen Adamson's "BrandSimple," without a doubt, holds up to its title. I have read many books on brand and they all seem to be very process-oriented and heavy with terminology. In my opinion, this book gets to the core of a brand and reaches Adamson's goal of simplifying the brand process.
